title: The One About Getting Older
description:
This week on Sibling Rivalry, Bob reveals his "criminal" past, Monét talks about her birthday, and Bob and Monét discuss age in the drag and queer communities. Tune in to find out RuRaul's villain origin story and who Bob and Monét think the stars of a Lady Bunny biopic should be!
Head to Squarespace.com for a free trial, and when you’re ready to launch, go to squarespace.com/RIVALRY to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
